Hm, yes a ts(telesync) is a filmed with a videocam in a public cinema, but the sound is taken from the digital source so the sound should be more or less(depending on compressionlevel) the same as dvd or higher.

try to lern things before talking

A telesync is the same spec as a CAM except it uses an external audio source (most likely an audio jack in the chair for hard of hearing people). A direct audio source does not ensure a good quality audio source, as a lot of background noise can interfere. A lot of the times a telesync is filmed in an empty cinema or from the projection booth with a professional camera, giving a better picture quality. Quality ranges drastically, check the sample before downloading the full release. A high percentage of Telesyncs are CAMs that have been mislabeled.
